messageTemplates.body:
Good day! 

We’re happy to let you know that your *GEMS medical aid benefits have renewed.
You may now be eligible for:

• Your annual hearing assessment
• A new set of hearing aids

Let us know if you’d like to book an appointment.

_- Plan and benefits dependant_

messageTemplates.body:
*Exciting News*

*You may qualify for up to 90% off* on your new set of *rechargeable hearing aids** through your medical aid. 

* Dependant on plan and benefits available.
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal:
*Exciting News*

*You may qualify for up to 90% off* on your new set of *rechargeable hearing aids** through your medical aid. 

* Dependant on plan and benefits available.

messageTemplates.body:
Good day, I’ve completed your benefit check - good news, your medical aid currently has benefits available based on the R45 000 quotation. Our devices start from R20 000 depending on your needs.

*Note:* These benefits come from a special benefit that only activates once your savings are fully used and the self-payment gap requirement for hearing aids is met. If not used by year-end, the benefit resets and you’ll need to use your savings again next year before it activates. 

Would you like to go ahead and schedule a free consultation?
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal:

messageTemplates.body: Good day, this is Hearing Aid Labs and we have been trying to contact you to schedule your hearing aid fitment appointment but have been unable to reach you. Could you kindly contact us to enable us to schedule your hearing aid fitment appointment.

messageTemplates.body:
Dear Value Patient,
We’re excited to introduce our new Interton *rechargeable hearing aids*, now available at a special launch rate. These devices offer *stronger Bluetooth, improved stability*, and the latest Auracast™ technology for clearer, high-quality sound.

*With Auracast you get:*

• Direct streaming from your phone, TV, or compute
• Easy connection to audio in public places (no pairing needed)
• Clearer sound with less background noise
• Personal volume control
• Better battery efficiency

Reply to this msg to learn more!
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal:

Hi {{name}}, hope this message finds you in great spirits! ???? 

 We've developed a Hearing Loss Quiz that's been getting amazing feedback. Given your interest in our free hearing screen test on Facebook, I thought you might be interested in giving it a go! ????

Hi {{name}}, hope you’re well today. I tried calling you regarding your request to book an appointment for our *free hearing screen test*. Please let me know which day and time suits you best. The test itself takes 15-30 minutes. Looking forward to hearing from you

Hi {{name}}, thank you for visiting us and trusting us to assist you in taking care of your hearing. You have mentioned to us you have someone that can also benefit from our services, you can make an appointment here or send us their details to contact them directly.

Hi {{name}}, we trust you are well. We would like to inform you that our Moreleta practice has moved to Doringkloof mall and is under new management. We would love to hear how you are doing and try our best to assist as best as we can to improve our services and/or your experiences with hearing aids. Please reach out to us if we can be of any assistance

Hi {{name}}, you recently had a hearing screening at your workplace wellness day with one of our specialists. The results suggest that a full diagnostic hearing assessment with our Audiologist is needed due to some abnormalities found in your hearing thresholds. Please let us know a convenient date and time for your appointment.

Hi {{name}}, thank you for visiting Hearing Aid Labs today! Could you please take a moment to review us on Google? Your feedback helps us improve our services. Click the link to share your thoughts. Thank you in advance ????

Hi {{name}}, cleaning and maintaining your hearing aids is essential for optimal performance, hygiene, and longevity. Come in for this *free service* and have your hearing aids cleaned & checked while you wait.

Good day! We’re excited to announce that our practice has moved to a new, more convenient location. Our new address is: 

*Shop 2, Entrance 2, Westville Mall, 35 Buckingham, Westville.*

We look forward to welcoming you for all your hearing care needs in our updated space!

Hi {{name}}, I tried calling earlier but couldn’t reach you. I wanted to share more about our exclusive launch offer on our new rechargeable hearing aids:

Hi {{name}}, 

In preparation for our annual closure, we want to inform you that battery orders will be temporarily unavailable from 20th December 2023, till 6th January 2025. To ensure uninterrupted service, kindly place your battery orders before 19th December.

We appreciate your continued support, and as the holiday season approaches, we extend warm wishes to you and your family. Thank you for being a valued client. We look forward to serving you in the future.

Hi {{name}}, we hope this message finds you well. We wanted to apologize for the delay in getting back to you.  Our system was temporarily down, and we were unable to respond. 

Everything has been resolved, and we are now ready to assist you.

Chat soon!

messageTemplates.body: Hi {{1}}, this is Hearing Aid Labs, you enquired on our free hearing screen test a while ago. After numerous failed attempts to contact you to book your appointment, we are now closing your enquiry. Please do not hesitate to contact us should you at any stage wish to continue with your appointment.

messageTemplates.body:
Hello! Thank you for contacting Hearing Aid Labs. Please may we have your name and the area you are in so that our branch nearest to you may be of assistance? 
Please note: Our operating hours are 09:00 - 17:00 (Mon-Fri) and 09:00 - 13:00 (Saturdays) 
*This is an automatic message*

messageTemplates.bodyOriginal: Hi {{name}}, we tried to make contact with you regarding your interest in our *free hearing screen test*. Please let us know when you're available. Looking forward to hearing from you.

messageTemplates.body: Good day, we tried to give you a call - Is now a good time to chat?

messageTemplates.body:
Hi {{name}}, 
Thank you for showing interest in our hearing screen test. To book your appointment, please advise which date and time would suit you best? The test itself takes 15-30 minutes.

messageTemplates.body: Hi {{name}}, this is a reminder of your upcoming appointment tomorrow for your Free Hearing Screen Test at Hearing Aid Labs. We look forward to welcoming you! Please be sure to reach out to us should you need directions or to reschedule.

Hi {{name}}, a while ago you signed up for our free hearing screen test through Facebook. Let us know if you are ready to book an appointment. The test takes 15 – 20 minutes. If you are no longer interested, please reply with text 'opt-out' so we will not bother you again
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal: Hi {{name}}, a while ago you signed up for our free hearing screen test through Facebook. Let us know if you are ready to book an appointment. The test takes 15 – 20 minutes. If you are no longer interested, please reply with text 'opt-out' so we will not bother you again

messageTemplates.body: Hi {{name}}, you have been transferred to your preferred branch. May we continue booking your appointment for the free hearing screen test?
Hi {{name}}, we’re sorry to see you missed your appointment and hope everything is well. Would you like to reschedule?
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal: Hi {{name}}, we’re sorry to see you missed your appointment and hope everything is well. Would you like to reschedule?

messageTemplates.body: Hi {{name}}, thank you for scheduling an appointment at Hearing Aid Labs. Your appointment is confirmed. You will receive a Google Calendar invite with all important info. Please kindly accept the invite. Let us know if you did not receive it. Looking forward to meeting you at our store

Hi {{name}}, we tried to call to remind you that your hearing aids are due for a service. Please come through and book them in with our secretary. We hope everything is going well with your hearing aids. Let us know if you have any questions or need assistance.
Hi {{name}}, we would like to invite you for a wellness check regarding the state of your hearing. May we schedule an appointment?
Hi {{name}}, you were referred by a friend for a free hearing screen test. Please let us know when we can schedule you in for an appointment.
Hi {{name}}, how are you today? Are you free to chat about your appointment request for a free hearing screen test of which you applied for through Facebook?
Hi {{name}}, are you well? Are you free to chat about your appointment request for a full diagnostic test of which you applied for through Facebook? Due to ringing in your ears?
Hello! Thank you for contacting Hearing Aid Labs. Please may we have your name and the area you are in so that our branch nearest to you may be of assistance? *This is an automatic message*
Hi {{name}}, we tried to make contact with you regarding your interest in our *free hearing screen test*. Please let us know when you're available. Looking forward to hearing from you.

Thank you for booking an appointment with us. You will receive a Google Calendar invite with all important info if your email address was provided. Please kindly accept the invite. Let us know if you did not receive it.
Hi {{name}}, we attempted to contact you again to discuss scheduling an appointment for our free hearing screen test. Please let us know if you are ready to schedule.????

Hi {{name}} Thank you for your visit to Hearing Aid Labs! Would you be willing to write us a review Facebook? It should only take a couple minutes and would make an immense difference to our company.

 If you are willing, you can follow the link below to submit your Facebook review.

 Please let me know if you are not pleased with our service, and we can speak about it personally, so your customer feedback is heard.

Thank you again for your time.
Hey {{name}}, we attempted to call you to follow up on how your hearing treatment is going. We would genuinely appreciate your feedback.

Thank you {{name}}, for booking an appointment with us. You will receive a Google Calendar invite with all important info if your email address was provided. Please kindly accept the invite. Let us know if you did not receive it.

Hi {{name}}! This is Clayton from Hearing Aid Labs. I tried reaching out to you regarding your interest in our free hearing screen test that you had shown on Facebook. I wanted to follow up and see when it would be most convenient for you to schedule the appointment. Looking forward to hearing from you!

Good day {{name}}, this is Hearing Aid Labs. We hope you're doing well. We wanted to check if you have obtained the referral letter from your GP as required by your medical aid. If you haven't obtained it yet or if you have any concerns, please let us know. We are here to assist you and answer any questions you may have. Thank you in advance for coming back to us!

Hi {{name}}, this is Hearing Aid Labs, you enquired on our free hearing screen test a while ago. After numerous failed attempts to contact you to book your appointment, we are now closing your enquiry. Please do not hesitate to contact us should you at any stage wish to continue with your appointment.
Hi {{name}}, I hope this finds you well. You requested that we contact you for an appointment for your mum. Is now a good time?

Hi {{name}}, This is an auto-reply message.
We have received your message and we have an update for you.
Hi {{1}}, this is a reminder for your free hearing screen test appointment tomorrow at {{2}}. The test takes only 15-30 minutes. We would like to confirm if you can still make it?
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal: Hi {{name}}, this is a reminder for your free hearing screen test appointment tomorrow at {{appt_time}}. The test takes only 15-30 minutes. We would like to confirm if you can still make it?

messageTemplates.body:
Good day, and thank you for showing interest in our free hearing screening test on Facebook! 

However, it appears that we currently do not have a practice near your location.

If you find yourself in the area of one of our practices, please feel free to reach out!
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal:
Good day, and thank you for showing interest in our free hearing screening test on Facebook! 

However, it appears that we currently do not have a practice near your location.

If you find yourself in the area of one of our practices, please feel free to reach out!

messageTemplates.body:
Good day, 

Thank you for choosing Hearing Aid Labs as your trusted hearing care partner.

We would like to inform you that GEMS Medical Aid has recently introduced additional tests and  new procedures for the dispensing of hearing devices. These changes requires the use of specialised equipment and have unfortunately caused delays in payment and processing.

Please, rest assured that we are doing every possible thing to minimise any inconvenience and will fit you with your new devices as soon as possible.

We appreciate your patience.
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal:
Good day,

We would like to inform you that GEMS Medical Aid has recently introduced additional tests and  new procedures for the dispensing of hearing devices. These changes requires the use of specialised equipment and have unfortunately caused delays in payment and processing.

Please, rest assured that we are doing every possible thing to minimise any inconvenience and will fit you with your new devices as soon as possible.

We appreciate your patience.

messageTemplates.body:
Free Hearing Aid Performance Check & Cleaning 
Dear Valued Patient,

Take care of your hearing aids - and they’ll take care of you! ?????

Regular maintenance can prolong the life and performance of your hearing aids - and it’s completely free!

What’s included:

? Performance check
? Quick & friendly service
? Expert cleaning (all brands welcome)

Looking forward to see you soon!
messageTemplates.bodyOriginal:

header.text: Thanks for contacting Hearing Aid Labs!

messageTemplates.body:
We’d love to help, but we’re currently closed. Our operating hours are:

🕒 Mon-Fri: 09:30 – 17:00
🕒 Saturday: 09:30 – 12:00
🕒 Sundays/Public Holidays: Closed

We’ll get back to you on the next working day. Chat soon!
Hi {{name}}, Sorry for missing your message! Are you free to continue our chat?
